src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? [MASK] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [end] RP : Ok , and we have time to have a coffee before going upstairs , is that right ? @ G ( LP+RC , drink ( coffee ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . RP : Wait , so we 'll go to the cafeteria before taking the lift .
tgt: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RP : Hello ARI , we have to find a lift to get to the next floor . Where is the lift in this building ? @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( lift ) ) ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( lift ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RP : Yes , I do . I 'd like to know where the cafeteria is , um or , I do n't know , a restaurant here in the hospital ? @ G ( RP , go-to ( cafe ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Um , can you repeat that please ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RP : I 'm hard of hearing and the sound is a little low , can you repeat that please ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] RP : So , another question ... LC : Um , hello . Do you know where the toilets are ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . @ AG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) ) LC : Thank you . @ CG ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) )
tgt: ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . @ AG ( RP , go-to ( cafe ) ) LC : Um , can you repeat that please ? ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RP : Ok , thank you . @ CG ( RP , go-to ( cafe ) ) RP : So , another question ... LC : Um , hello . Do you know where the toilets are ? @ G ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LC : What time is it , please ? @ G ( LC , get-info ( time ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't know the answer . LC : Yeah , well it 's not much . RP : Is there a reception for people who have an appointment like me ? @ G ( RP , go-to ( reception ) ) [start] ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Can we have a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . LC : Can we have a coffee while we wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? RP : I can ask ... RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? It 's 6 PM , is the cafeteria still open ? [MASK] [end] ARI : No . The cafeteria is open from 11 AM to 3 PM . @ AG ( RP , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) )
tgt: ARI : Yes , of course . The reception is just behind me . src: LP : Hello ARI . ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Ask how ... [start] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [end] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . @ AG ( LP+RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . RC : Thank you . LP : Thank you very much ARI . ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day .

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? LC : Do you want to go to the toilet ? @ G ( LC , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Oh yes . And it 's urgent . @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . @ AG ( LC+RP , go-to ( toilet ) ) RP : Is it for women ? @ G ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) ARI : Yes . @ AG ( RP , go-to ( toilet ( for_women ) ) ) [start] RP : Thanks . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . RP : Oh , well , I 'd love to . [MASK] RP : What 's good on your menu ? [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RP : Well , thanks anyway . ARI : Thank you very much . LC : Can you tell me where room 17 is ? [MASK] RP : Oh , but I do n't know . RP : Is room 17 on the ground floor ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] LC : Normally , I have an appointment . RP : I have an appointment in room 17 . [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : So , where do the appointments take place ? Where are the appointments ? [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : Do you have another number for me ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RP : Okay well , thank you then . LC : The appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . RP : My appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . ARI : Yes . RP : An appointment of ... gerontology . ARI : Of course . RP : Where should I ... Where should I go in the hospital ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . RP : Ca n't you tell me what floor ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . ARI : Yes . Of course . RP : Oh , that 's nice . RP : Thank you . ARI : Thank you . ARI : See you around .
